TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 管理相关的选项卡页集。

span.span: Manages a related set of tab pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含选项卡页，由表示通过将你添加对象属性。A contains tab pages, which are represented by objects that you add through the property. 在此集合中的选项卡页的顺序反映的选项卡控件中显示的顺序。The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control. 用户可以更改当前通过单击控件中选项卡之一。The user can change the current by clicking one of the tabs in the control. 你可以以编程方式更改当前通过使用以下项之一属性：You can also programmatically change the current by using one of the following properties: - - 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，你还可以使用以下方法之一：In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - - 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，你可以在当前选项卡，更改通过处理以下事件之一时响应：In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - - - - 中的选项卡属于，但不是包括个人的一部分控件。The tabs in a are part of the , but not parts of the individual controls. 成员类，如属性，会影响仅选项卡页，但不是制表符的客户端矩形。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外，方法编辑不会隐藏选项卡。若要隐藏选项卡上，必须删除控件从集合。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分和的事件发生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，和的事件操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 不会引发以下事件类，除非没有至少一个中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果没有至少一个在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中名称显示)，则引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互在的选项卡页，引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 中包含的控件显示选项卡页，并显示的选项卡页不会激活这些控件中的任何数据绑定时才会创建。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 当启用了可视样式时，和属性设置为值，选项卡的内容可能未正确呈现。When visual styles are enabled, and the property is set to a value other than , the tab contents might not render correctly. 若要解决此问题，你可以绘制选项卡内容自行使用所有者描述。To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 TabControl Display Side-Aligned 选项卡](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-side-aligned-tabs-with-tabcontrol.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-side-aligned-tabs-with-tabcontrol.md). 当属性设置为值和属性设置为值，选项卡页面内容可能未正确呈现。When the property is set to a value other than and the property is set to a value other than , the tab page contents might not render correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 Visual Studio Windows 窗体设计器来创建与三个选项卡页。The following code example uses the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer to create a with three tab pages. 每个选项卡页包含几个控件。Each tab page contains several controls. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为或、属性自动设置为`true`。When the property is set to or , the property is automatically set to `true`. 当你将设置属性，它仅显示为此类在属性设置为。When you set the property to , it only appears as such when the property is set to . 否则为属性显示就像设置为值。Otherwise, the property displays as if set to the value. 当你将设置属性，还必须设置属性以便按钮正确显示。When you set the property to , you must also set the property to so that the buttons display correctly. > [!NOTE] > 当你将设置属性`Buttons`，还必须设置属性`Top`以便选项卡页内容正确显示。When you set the property to `Buttons`, you must also set the property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly. 此外，当启用了可视样式，和属性设置为值，选项卡的内容可能未正确呈现。Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the property is set to a value other than , the tab contents may not render correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个对象。The following code example creates a with three objects. 属性设置为`Left`，其定位的选项卡`tabControl1`左侧。The property is set to `Left`, which positions the tabs of `tabControl1` on the left side. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前选项卡中的更改时，按以下顺序发生以下事件。When the current tab changes in a , the following events occur in the following order. - - - - 这些事件，可以执行任务，例如如果取消选项卡更改处于无效状态，或更新的状态的新显示。These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed . 当前选项卡，更改当用户单击选项卡上，在调用时或方法，或当你更改的值或属性。The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the or method, or when you change the value of the or property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TabControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TabControl1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置属性、引发事件需要绘制其选项卡之一时。When you set the property to , the raises the event whenever it needs to paint one of its tabs. 若要自定义选项卡的外观，请提供代码中的处理程序事件。To customize the appearance of the tabs, provide your own painting code in a handler for the event. 不使用所有者描述支持可变的选项卡大小。The does not support variable tab sizes with owner drawing. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有一个。The following code example creates a with one . 此示例声明的事件处理程序用于绘制一个字符串和`Rectangle`的选项卡上`tabPage1`。This example declares an event handler that is used to draw a string and `Rectangle` on the tab of `tabPage1`. 事件处理程序绑定到`DrawItem`事件。The event handler is bound to the `DrawItem` event. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否打开从右向左的镜像放置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.

span.span: if right-to-left mirror placement is turned on; for standard child control placement.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是主要用于开发的全球受众的窗体。The property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences. 多个容器经过专门设计，因此，控件进行布局的容器中以从左到右的方式。Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion. 这些容器将遵循此编写指导的语言与兼容。These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction. 但是，当从右到左语言的用户显示的相同容器，通常最好是反向窗体上控件的顺序。However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form. 如果这两个和属性`true`、 镜像将为启用的容器和控件位置和文本流将从右到左。If both the and properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left. 更改此属性的值引发事件。Changing the value of this property raises the event. 有关的全球化问题的详细信息，请参阅[开发全球通用应用程序的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md)。For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md).
